title: Guitar Basics for Beginners
description: Learn the fundamentals of playing the guitar, including chords, strumming, and basic songs.

title: Mastering Piano Techniques
description: An intermediate course focusing on piano finger techniques, scales, and harmony.

title: Electronic Music Production
description: Create your own electronic music using digital audio workstations and sound design.

title: Jazz Improvisation
description: Explore jazz theory and improvisational techniques to elevate your performance.

title: Vocal Training 101
description: Build your vocal range, pitch control, and breathing techniques for better singing.
